src_original: sarve 'te nirmitā.  āha: katamo bhagavan dharmo yo na nirmitaḥ?  bhagavān āha:  yasya notpādo na nirodhaḥ sa na nirmitaḥ.
tgt_original: 『如佛所說一切諸法性空，非聲聞作乃至非諸佛作。

src_original: āha: sa punaḥ katamaḥ?  bhagavān āha:  asaṃmoṣadharmanirvāṇasamayaṃ dharmo na nirmitaḥ.  āha: yat punar bhagavatoktaṃ śūnyatāyāś ca na calati. na ca dvayenopalabhyate na ca kaścid dharmo yo na śūnyatā. tasmād bhagavann asaṃmoṣadharmanirvāṇaṃ nirmitaṃ bhaviṣyati.
evam etat subhūte evam etat,  sarvadharmāḥ subhūte svabhāvaśūnyāḥ,
te na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kṛtāḥ,  yā ca svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā tan nirvāṇaṃ.
tgt_original: 若新發意菩薩聞一切法皆是性空，乃至涅槃亦皆如化，心即驚怖。 為是新發意菩薩故，分別生滅者如化，不生滅者不如化。

src_original: ādikarmiko bhagavaṃ pudgalaḥ katham avavaditavyaḥ katham anuśātivyaḥ yat svabhāvaśūnyatāṃ jānīyāt?
